item.title: Welcome to my web presence!
item.description: Hi! I’m Catielle, a Brazilian screenwriter and visual storyteller based in Tuscany, Italy. I’m a compulsive reader, crazy about movies, and a music-driven person. In my spare time, I usually will be doing one of these things. I have a beautiful daugther, an adorable dog and few friends. Here you can find all my projects and also can read my blog, where I write about my life and creative processes.
